body.name: RIFLE PAPER CO. Marguerite Social Stationery Set - Set of 12 Cover-Weight Flat Notes - Full Color Designs on Back - Natural White Cover Paper - Great for Thank Yous, Greetings and More

byLineInfo.name: Visit the RIFLE PAPER CO. Store

deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 20 hrs 8 mins
features: BRIGHT, BEAUTIFUL DESIGN: For thank-yous, greetings, and everything in between, this Social Stationery set includes 12 cover-weight flat notes with full-color designs on the back. Each set comes with a six-count of two different designs and envelopes inside a matching box.

EVERYTHING YOU NEED AND MORE: Rifle Paper Co. offers a wide variety of products that range from stationery and greeting cards to phone cases and home decor. This trendy lifestyle brand only uses high-quality materials and unique hand-painted designs by Rifle Paper Co. co-founder Anna Bond.

PRETTY AND PRACTICAL: Rifle Paper Co. creates products such as notebooks, pens, and planners that will help you stay organized and fashionable at the office. Or, enjoy Rifle Paper Co. products when you're studying for school at the library or getting creative while working from home.

GIVE A FUN GIFT TO YOUR LOVED ONES: Rifle Paper Co. products will be useful for any of your loved ones. These accessories are printed in full color and are a unique gift year-round. Great for birthdays, Christmas, and every occasion in between! Your friends and family will want to collect more of our beautiful stationery and accessories.

MAKE THE WORLD MORE COLORFUL: Rifle Paper Co. started as a stationery company but our goal is to create quality products that bring beauty to the everyday. With each hand-painted illustration and distinctive color palette, our passion is to produce quality products with beauty in mind. We hope by using our products you'll get inspired and have fun!
body.description: Our Story Hand-painted illustrations and a distinctive color palette are at the heart of Rifle Paper Co. From stationery and desk accessories to thoughtful gifts and home decor, our products are both pretty and practical. All our designs are based on Anna Bond’s hand-painted illustrations and floral patterns. We create products that are well-designed, high-quality, and accessible. Our goal is to create high-quality products that exceed your expectations. Every detail of our products is important to us, which means hand-assembling many of our products in our own Florida warehouse, and establishing decade-long relationships with local printers.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Bring Beauty to the Everyday Rifle Paper Co. is a lifestyle brand featuring bold colors, hand-painted florals, and whimsical characters. Our goal is to create quality products that bring beauty to the everyday.

Our collection of paper-wrapped desk accessories has everything you need to get the job done. Use them individually or as a set, and bring a little beauty to your everyday. Garden Party Desk Tackle Box The divided box is printed with our Garden Party pattern, and comes filled with pencils, push pins, binder clips, paper clips, magnets, a tear-off notepad, and an eraser. Working from home has never been so easy! Strawberry Fields Desk Organizer The Rifle Paper Co. Strawberry Fields Desk Organizer features full color florals plus the back section is wide enough to hold a file folder, and the front sections are perfectly sized for notepads or your phone Garden Party Pencil Cup Garden Party Pencil Cup features gold foil accents plus removable dividers to keep things organized. Garden Party Magazine Holder The Rifle Paper Co. Garden Party Magazine Holder features gold foil accents plus a metal label holder, to make a note of what’s inside.
Enjoy Rifle Paper Co. products when you're studying for school at the library or getting creative while working from home.

Other Rifle Paper Co. Products You’ll Love Notebooks & Journals Your desk could use some flowers. Our collection has everything you need to get the job done. Boxed Notecards This stationery set includes gold foil accents and 12 cover-weight flat notes with full-color designs on the back. Each set comes with a four-count of three different designs and envelopes inside a matching box. Greeting Cards Send your favorite someone a thoughtful message with one of our fun greeting cards. A blank interior lets your handwritten note take center stage.
Make your workspace more colorful with Rifle Paper Co.

Our Founders Our company was founded in 2009 by husband-wife team Nathan and Anna Bond. They live in Winter Park, FL with their three boys. Our Story Hand-painted illustrations and a distinctive color palette are at the heart of Rifle Paper Co. From stationery and desk accessories to thoughtful gifts and home decor, our products are both pretty and practical. All our designs are based on Anna Bond’s hand-painted illustrations and floral patterns. We create products that are well-designed, high-quality, and accessible. Our goal is to create high-quality products that exceed your expectations. Every detail of our products is important to us, which means hand-assembling many of our products in our own Florida warehouse, and establishing decade-long relationships with local printers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely, quality note cards!
reviews.reviewText: This company offers quality, good looking note cards! I’m a fan of Rifle Paper Company!
